meanings.definition: A Canadian dish consisting of French fries topped with cheese curds and gravy.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious poutines at the food truck.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves traditional poutines with a twist.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last of the poutines.
meanings.sent4: The poutines were a comforting hug in a bowl on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling poutines made my mouth water.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various poutines for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: We ordered two poutines to share among the group.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was stocked with leftovers, including multiple poutines.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the savory scent of the freshly made poutines.
meanings.sent5: The table was crowded with colorful poutines of different flavors.
